I complained about not having enough Canadian Bacon and the manager said I can get my money back. I wasted 15 minutes there and that was the solution.  He was rude and very uneducated manager.

text: I ordered over the phone I live 15 mins from the place took them 1 hour and a half for them to get to me after an hour I called them and they didn't have my order on the records. When they finally got to me the good was cold and dry. I will not order from this place again .

text: No complains for now, wait time to order pizza was little long of 3 mins (minus 1 star) but the answering agent was good. Delivery time for 3 miles distance is 45mins (minus 1 star) but the delivery man George P was nice and in hurry for next delivery.
